item.description:
Sat. 9/22 and Sun. 9/23 - KidsFest at Wachusett Mountain
10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
Wachusett Mountain Ski Area
499 Mountain Road
Princeton, MA

Two full days of music, food and fun for the whole family. Highlights for 2012 include a brand new BMX stunt and skateboard show by the NE Trick Stars, High Flying Trampoline Acts with Flippenout Productions, the Marvelous Mutts dog show and much more to come. WXLO will conduct Wachusett's Got Talent" and Radio Disney will be there on Saturday playing music everyone knows. Lazer Tag, Pony Rides, Moonwalks and enjoy tons of interactive games including jugglers, magicians, balloon artists, clowns and face painting.
http://www.wachusett.com

Мы планируем туда приехать в субботу, часам к 11. Пожалуйста, звоните 508-450-7915. Мария

Если кто-то может только в вс, дайте мне знать - соберем еще одну группу на вс)))

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: KidsFest at Wachusett Mountain
